original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares jump in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘s shares jumped in mid day trade on Wednesday, on assurances from domestic debt restructuring, an analyst said.
The main All Share Price Index was up 1.17 percent or 120.31 points to 10,436.12, the most liquid index S&P SL20 was up 1.55 percent or 46.58 points to 3.050.08.
There has been interest in the banking, insurance and blue chip counters, which is pushing the market on higher share volume and carrying the market on green.(Colombo/July12/2023)
